items.name: Osa Conservation Art Pathway
items.short_description: Discover a unique outdoor gallery featuring local artists' interpretations of Osa's rich biodiversity, blending art seamlessly with the rainforest environment.

items.name: Boruca Indigenous Craft Center
items.short_description: Step into a vibrant showcase of the Boruca people's artistry, where traditional masks, textiles, and crafts tell ancient stories of Costa Rica.

items.name: Gold Rush History Corner
items.short_description: Unearth the past in this small, curated display dedicated to Puerto Jiménez's gold mining heritage, showcasing tools and tales from a bygone era.

items.name: Golfo Dulce Marine Life Exhibit
items.short_description: Explore interactive exhibits that highlight the incredible biodiversity of the Golfo Dulce, from playful dolphins to majestic humpback whales.

items.name: Agua Dulce Sunset Deck
items.short_description: Perched above the tree line, this restaurant deck offers panoramic views of the Pacific Ocean, perfect for sunset cocktails and spotting wildlife.

items.name: Lapa Rios Rainforest Vista Lounge
items.short_description: Experience breathtaking views of the rainforest canopy meeting the ocean from this elevated lounge, a prime spot for birdwatching and tranquility.

items.name: El Remanso Elevated Dining
items.short_description: Dine suspended amidst the jungle, offering a unique perspective of the rich biodiversity and glimpses of the Pacific horizon.

items.name: Golfo Dulce Bay Viewpoint
items.short_description: An informal, elevated spot in town offering charming views of the Golfo Dulce, perfect for watching local boats and the occasional dolphin.

items.name: Puerto Jiménez Farmer's Market
items.short_description: Immerse yourself in local life at this bustling weekly market, offering fresh produce, artisanal goods, and authentic Costa Rican flavors.

items.name: Osa Artisan Craft Stalls
items.short_description: Discover unique handmade souvenirs and gifts crafted by local artisans, from intricate jewelry to sustainable wood carvings, reflecting the region's natural beauty.

items.name: Fisherman's Daily Catch
items.short_description: Witness the day's fresh bounty as local fishermen bring in their catch. A true taste of authentic coastal life and the freshest seafood.

items.name: Corcovado Gateway Bazaar
items.short_description: Stock up on essentials and unique keepsakes before or after your Corcovado adventure, with a selection of outdoor gear and local trinkets.

items.name: Bosque del Cabo Cliffside Pool
items.short_description: Swim on the edge of the world in this stunning infinity pool, offering unparalleled views of the Pacific Ocean and vibrant jungle below.

items.name: Lapa Rios Jungle Edge Pool
items.short_description: Immerse yourself in nature at this eco-lodge's infinity pool, where the rainforest meets the sea, and monkeys might join you from the trees.

items.name: El Remanso Cascading Horizon Pool
items.short_description: This multi-tiered infinity pool blends seamlessly with the jungle, offering serene relaxation and a sense of being one with the wild Osa Peninsula.

items.name: Iguana Lodge Oceanfront Pool
items.short_description: Enjoy an infinity edge pool just steps from the beach, providing refreshing dips with the sound of waves and stunning views of the Pacific.

items.name: Puerto Jiménez Airstrip
items.short_description: More than just a runway, this charming airstrip is the iconic gateway to the Osa Peninsula, offering breathtaking aerial views upon arrival and departure.

items.name: Golfo Dulce Public Pier
items.short_description: A bustling hub where fishing boats dock and tour operators depart. The pier offers fantastic views of the gulf and local life unfolding.

items.name: Corcovado National Park Entrance Sign
items.short_description: Capture your adventure's beginning at the official entrance sign to Corcovado National Park, signaling your immersion into one of the world's most biodiverse places.

items.name: The Grand Ceiba Tree
items.short_description: Stand in awe beneath the colossal canopy of a magnificent ancient Ceiba tree, a true natural monument and symbol of the Osa's pristine wilderness.

items.name: Bioluminescent Kayaking in Golfo Dulce
items.short_description: Paddle through a magical night as the waters of Golfo Dulce light up with ethereal blue glow, a truly unforgettable natural phenomenon.

items.name: Osa Mangrove Labyrinth
items.short_description: Navigate an intricate maze of vital mangrove channels, teeming with unique wildlife from crocodiles to exotic birds.

items.name: Scarlet Macaw Roosting Trees
items.short_description: Witness a spectacular daily natural event as hundreds of vibrant scarlet macaws gather in specific trees, filling the air with color and squawks.

items.name: Carbonera Hidden Hot Springs
items.short_description: Discover a secluded natural hot spring nestled deep within the rainforest, offering a rejuvenating soak surrounded by pristine wilderness.

items.name: Treehouse Lodge at Finca Bellavista
items.short_description: Live out your childhood dreams in an incredible treehouse, nestled high in the canopy, offering a truly immersive jungle experience.

items.name: Glamping Tents at Saladero Eco Lodge
items.short_description: Experience luxury camping in spacious safari-style tents, with comfortable beds and stunning views of the Golfo Dulce from your private deck.

items.name: Open-Air Bungalows at Osa Clandestina
items.short_description: Connect deeply with nature in these thoughtfully designed, open-air bungalows, where the sounds of the jungle become your lullaby.

items.name: Beachfront Cabinas at Matapalo Retreat
items.short_description: Relax in charming, rustic cabinas just steps from the wild, pristine beaches of Matapalo, where surf and jungle meet.

items.name: Fisherman's Wharf & Boat Row
items.short_description: Stroll along the vibrant waterfront where colorful fishing boats are docked, surrounded by brightly painted local houses and bustling activity.

items.name: Main Street Artisan Row
items.short_description: Explore the town's main street, dotted with lively storefronts and small galleries showcasing local crafts and vibrant murals.

items.name: Local Eateries & Soda Strip
items.short_description: A charming stretch of road featuring a collection of colorful local sodas and restaurants, each offering delicious Tico cuisine in a festive setting.
items.location_hint: South end of town near the airport

items.name: Central Park & Community Hub
items.short_description: The heart of Puerto Jiménez, this area surrounds the central park with its bright benches and local buildings, often hosting community events.

items.name: Casa Orquideas Secret Garden
items.short_description: Discover a tranquil, hidden courtyard within this famous botanical garden, bursting with exotic orchids and a serene atmosphere.
items.location_hint: Casa Orquideas (accessible by boat from PJ)

items.name: Local Cafe Oasis Courtyard
items.short_description: Tucked away off the main thoroughfare, this charming cafe offers a peaceful, plant-filled courtyard perfect for a quiet coffee break.

items.name: Artisan Workshop Passage
items.short_description: A narrow, often overlooked passage leading to small workshops where local artists create and display their unique handmade goods.
items.location_hint: Off the road to Dos Brazos

items.name: Garden Inn Secluded Patio
items.short_description: Find peace in this small inn's hidden patio, a lush green space perfect for reading or enjoying a quiet moment away from the town's gentle bustle.

items.name: Osa Wildlife Conservation Mural
items.short_description: A striking mural depicting the diverse wildlife of the Osa Peninsula, a vibrant testament to local conservation efforts and natural beauty.

items.name: Fisherman's Story Wall
items.short_description: A series of colorful murals along the waterfront that tell the stories of Puerto Jiménez's fishing heritage and connection to the sea.

items.name: Corcovado Flora & Fauna Murals
items.short_description: Vivid murals adorning buildings near the park's gateway, showcasing the incredible plant and animal life found within Corcovado National Park.

items.name: Indigenous Boruca Mask Mural
items.short_description: A powerful and colorful mural celebrating the iconic masks and rich cultural traditions of the Boruca indigenous people.
